resources.string: Are you ready to invest your hard earned money? Show us what you know!
1) Investing is risky, and a company can go bankrupt. What is the total worth of a company\'s physical assets when it goes out of business
2) You want to buy a company cheap. What ratio tells you how many times earnings are you paying the company
3) A dollar now is worth more than a dollar in an year. What do you use to value an investemnet?
4) Debt is dangerous. Which one of the following indicators shows if a company has more debt then it should ?
5) Your company must be profitable. How can you know that?
6) Sound difficult, right? What is then historically the most profitable way to invest?
Check the last 12 month stock price
Calculate the return on invested capital
The future dividend is the most important thing
I\'ll give my money to a fund manager, he knows what to do
Put your money in a low cost passive index fund and forget about it
